statements: DELETE FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE policy_name = 'HIPAA' AND compliance_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM audit_records WHERE audit_user = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Regulatory_Requirements WHERE requirement_id IN (SELECT requirement_id FROM Regulatory_Requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'GDPR');
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE id = 1 AND policy_name = 'Example Policy';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 100 OR user_id = 5;
